# fakemake
## Introduction
Please read the
[vignette](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/fvafrCU/fakemake/blob/master/inst/doc/An_Introduction_to_fakemake.html).

Or, after installation, the help page:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
help("fakemake-package", package = "fakemake")
```
```{r, echo = FALSE}
  # insert developement page
  help_file <- file.path("man", "fakemake-package.Rd")
  captured <- gsub('_\b', '',  capture.output(tools:::Rd2txt(help_file) ))
  cat(captured, sep = "\n")
```
